name: Ta mère serait fière
description:
A game for the ENJAM 2020 : 

"Wait, are we the bad guy ?"

As mom says : "the bad ones are not the bad ones"

Thanks to my lovely friends and my mom. I love you all.

"Le jeu à l'air d'être marrant' 

-Valentin, 22:27
